title: Weleda Natural & Homeopathic Medicines - Cineraria D3 Eyedrops - Cataract
cleaned_text: | In 1921 Pharmacists and physicians gathered in Switzerland under the guidance of Dr. Rudolf Steiner, the founder of anthroposophy, to create a natural and personal care company later called WELEDA. Using pharmaceutical techniques combined with a spiritual approach, they formulated a truly innovative line of quality products based upon the study of relationships between the substances and processes of nature and the human being. By cuLivating plants using organic and biodynamic agricuLural methods, harvesting them at peak times, and processing them with the utmost care, WELEDA believes it is possible to retain a plant's inherent qualities and healing properties.
